name: Embed Notion Pages
author: Embed Notion Pages

sections.description:
Embed Notion Pages is a powerful tool that lets you harness the power of Notion and embed its pages into your own website. Create your content in Notion, grab the provided embed code, and seamlessly integrate beautifully updated pages onto your site.

While Notion provides a fantastic platform for content creation, directing users to a public Notion domain may not provide the best user experience. Embed Notion Pages allows you to enjoy all the creative freedom Notion offers, customise your embed to match your brand, and let people experience it as part of your own website. Essentially, Embed Notion Pages amplifies your content presentation while maintaining the usability and simplicity of Notion.

This plugin works with shortcodes. Simply generate your Notion page embed code on our website and use the shortcode on your desired WordPress page/post.

Usage

  1. Create your Notion page embed on our website https://www.embednotionpages.com
  2. Use the WordPress shortcode [notion id="your-embed-id"] from your embed on your desired WordPress page/post.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Which Notion features are supported?

Embed Notion Pages allows you to embed the exact Notion page you created. As it’s not a static approximation of your content but the actual content, all Notion block types are supported.

How do I embed a Notion page?

To embed a Notion page, simply copy the public URL of the Notion page and paste it into the embed form on our website. Once the embed code is generated, use it as a shortcode in your WordPress post or page.

Do I need to manually update my embeds each time my page changes?

No, you do not need to manually update your embeds. We always display up-to-date content even on the free plan.

Can I embed private pages?

No, only publicly available Notion pages can be embedded at this time.

Can I embed multiple Notion pages into my website at once?

Yes, you can create multiple embeds and embed them anywhere on your website. For instance, you can insert multiple embed snippets into a single blog post.

How does the free plan work?

The free plan allows you to create up to 5 embeds. After two weeks, your embed code will expire, but you can create a new embed with the same Notion page.

How does the paid plan work?

Upon upgrading to the Pro plan, the expiration date and watermarks from all your embeds will be automatically removed. Plus, you’ll have the ability to create more embeds and apply customization options such as Dark Mode.

Can I cancel my subscription at any time?

Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time.

Is there a discount for students, schools, or non-profits?

Yes, discounts are available for students, schools, and non-profits. Please contact us with your details, and we’ll help set you up.

I have another question

For further inquiries, questions, or feedback, please feel free to contact us.

short_description: Create, embed, and sync your Notion pages on WordPress effortlessly with Embed Notion Pages.
